headline: The Smartest High-Yielding Dividend Stocks in the S&P 500 Index to Buy With $3,000 Right Now
summary: Dividend stocks can be a great way for investors to generate passive income.  Dividends can also be more predictable than stock prices, which have fluctuated intensely this year.  The stock market has been incredibly volatile this year, registering a nearly 20% fall from February highs before bouncing back with a roughly 20% gain since President Donald Trump's sweeping tariff announcement in April.

headline: Philippe Laffont’s Coatue Takes Fresh Stake in Philip Morris International Inc. (PM)
summary: Though primarily known for its focus on tech stocks, billionaire investor Philippe Laffont’s Coatue Management recently made a notable move by adding Philip Morris International Inc. (NYSE:PM) to its portfolio. The tobacco giant, traditionally seen as part of a defensive sector, now presents growth potential, thanks largely to its expanding lineup of smokeless products like […]

headline: A Billionaire Just Bought One of My Favorite Stocks. Should You Jump in Too?
summary: While he's known more as a tech investor, billionaire Philippe Laffont recently added Philip Morris International to his portfolio.  The company has the unique combination of being a growth stock in a defensive industry.  During the first quarter, billionaire investor Philippe Laffont of Coatue Management added one of my favorite stocks to his portfolio: Philip Morris International (NYSE: PM).
